37 5,716 5,716 6,471 7,238 462 557 891 1,028 1,295 1,388 1,348 1,448 1,520 843 2,167 328 396 697 828 1,052 1,134 1,124 1,148 1,205 1,205 1,434 1,591 134 161 194 200 243 254 224 300 315 409 576 1 1 1 14 13 13 13 41 34 112 96 463 558 892 1,042 1,308 1,401 1,361 1,489 1,554 1,554 1,955 2,263 250 317 424 722 1,051 1,051 1,152 1,161 1,121 984 1,037 1,074 161 232 236 369 438 423 399 360 252 341 378 89 85 188 353 613 729 762 761 732 696 696 1 1 14 10 250 317 424 722 722 1,051 1,051 1,152 1,161 1,122 985 1,051 1,084 62 101 157 165 166 155 137 126 116 112 134 62 101 157 165 166 155 137 126 116 112 134 14 13 32 37 37 37 31 29 28 33 33 76 114 189 202 203 192 168 155 144 145 167 1,457 1,797 2,022 2,443 2,394 2,366 2,407 2,451 2,451 2,744 2,744 3,042 3,392 336 472 558 567 516 450 374 389 372 441 596 180 224 294 359 350 333 393 259 251 232 241 571 649 668 733 717 690 625 579 491 456 432 176 203 263 307 341 421 653 811 1,084 1,320 1,514 51 89 298 290 260 231 221 322 369 399 23 43 43 39 42 45 194 198 150 179 180 189 188 149 185 182 165 4 19 20 7 8 31 35 64 1,457 1,797 2,022 2,447 2,413 2,386 2,414 2,459 2,775 2,775 3,077 3,456 185 116 188 164 201 222 224 225 54 53 47 46 48 73 71 : 35 20 27 27 27 24 40 སྨྲeཙ ' 168 239 236 69 108 127 22 42 52 1 1 1 1 1 1 96 43 14 114 91 16 17 19 36 50 199 132 205 183 237 272 306 312 6,582 7,395 8,237 2,758 3,291 4,101 5,263 5,928 6,099 6,152 6,354 6,582 126 125 113 109 76 88 56 82 87 90 4 32 258 243 268   ## p. 620 (#644) ############################################  Appendix 8 (continued) Aircraft in all Theaters against Germany June 1942 to August 1945 Combat Airplanes 1944 Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep 8,267 216 9,413 10,910 11,593 11,844 11,522 12,538 12,493 12,692 206 431 469 954 907 868 1,206 1,257 9,619 11,341 12,062 12,798 12,429 13,406 13,699 13,949 1st Line 2nd Line Total 8,483 Heavy Bombers 1st Line 2,608 2,842 3,524 3,900 4,347 4,226 4,605 4,880 4,995 B-17 1,650 1,701 1,701 1,884 1,860 1,863 1,786 2,011 2,195 2,011 2,195 2,334 B-24
